description: Try our easy to follow Make-At-Work Noodle Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Broccolini,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Tofu,Low fat,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Make-At-Work Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place noodles into 2 deep, sealable containers. Add broccolini, tofu, spinach and unopened miso soup sachet. Seal containers with lids.
At work, add miso powder to noodles and 2 cups boiling water into each bowl. Set aside for 10 minutes or until noodles have softened. Garnish with shredded nori sheets and ginger.
